sendinstructions.brief: Use this to send instructions to you
sendinstructions.help: If you don't understand how to play the game, use this command and the bot will tell you what you need to do.

countpeople.brief: Counts the werewolves alive and the villagers alive
countpeople.help: Counts the werewolves who are alive and the villagers who are alive.

startlynch.brief: Start a vote to kill someone.
startlynch.help: Start the voting process. The vote will close at night time automatically if the vote hasn't been closed yet.

startvote.help: This is very similar to the lynch voting, except that this vote doesn't kill anyone. Perfect for werewolves who want to talk about who they want to kill.

investigate.help: In order to investigate, you must also say who you want to investigate after invoking the command. You will see if that person is a werewolf or not.
